P3Skills.name: Rocky Taunt
P3Skills.description: Use earth magic to rumble the ground and annoy the enemies, increasing your chance of being attacked

P3Skills.name: Rumble & Tumble
P3Skills.description: Charge up your rocky fist and smash your oponent, chance to stun the enemy

P3Skills.name: Rocky Wall
P3Skills.description: Grant 100% chance of being targeted next turn and greatly reduced damage during that turn and heal a small amount, any previous taunts get removed

P3Skills.name: RagnaROCK
P3Skills.description: Cause mass earthquakes and stun all enemies
